Title: Commonwealth LNG secures funds for development from Kimmeridge
Description: US LNG project developer Commonwealth LNG has secured the funds needed to develop its 9.3 mtpa LNG export plant in Cameron, Louisiana and take a final investment decision on the project, thanks to investment capital from alternative asset management firm Kimmeridge Energy Management.
Author: CK

Title: Oman LNG signs four-year deal with SEFE to supply 0.4 mtpa of LNG
Description: State-owned Oman LNG has signed an agreement with Securing Energy for Europe (SEFE) to supply 0.4 mtpa of LNG over four years from 2026, with the volumes seen enhancing Germanyâ€™s energy security.
Author: CK
